rooms.description: Wide entrance hall aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow, featuring a traditional Chettinad archway.
Spacious living area with traditional Chettinad motifs and decor; oriented towards the east for sunlight.
Dining area integrated with the living space, featuring ornate wooden carvings and ample natural light.
Fully-equipped modern kitchen with traditional stone finishes, aligned according to Vastu by placing it in the southeast corner.
Master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden; designed with Chettinad interior detailing and natural ventilation as per Vastu.
Secondary bedroom featuring ample closet space, traditional wooden beams, and east-facing windows for early morning light.
Third bedroom with a quiet atmosphere, suitable for children or guests; Vastu-aligned by having clear sightlines to the garden.
Private en-suite bathroom attached to master bedroom, designed with water features as per Chettinad tradition and Vastu practices.
Fourth bedroom offering a peaceful retreat; includes traditional elements and north-east facing windows for balanced energy.
Fifth bedroom designed with simplicity, ensuring sufficient natural light and Vastu compliant positioning.
Sixth bedroom styled in a contemporary yet traditional Chettinad manner; oriented to harness optimal ventilation.
